title: Regional powers back aid for Afghanistan, say U.S. and allies should pay
content:
1. Regional powers back aid for Afghanistan, say U.S. and allies should pay  Reuters
  2. Russia suspends its NATO mission as Defense Secretary visits NATO aspirant countries  Fox News
  3. Russia Faces Difficult Balancing Act as It Hosts Taliban in Moscow  The Wall Street Journal
  4. Are NATO and Russia on a collision course? | Inside Story  Al Jazeera English
  5. Russia hosts Afghan talks, calls for an inclusive government  Associated Press

localize.title: 地域大国はアフガニスタンへの援助を支持し、米国と同盟国が支払うべきと発言
区域大国支持对阿富汗的援助，称美国和盟国应支付费用
區域大國支持對阿富汗的援助，稱美國和盟國應支付費用
